message: Take this generous offer and let's end the game early!
Meet me halfway, let's end this!
You're getting desperate, Bob. Meet me halfway, but not quite.
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'm taking a bigger share this time.
You're getting closer, but still not quite there, Bob. Keep trying!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking a bigger share now.
You're getting close to the edge, Bob. Don't push your luck!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking almost all the money now.
You're getting too greedy, Bob. I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
I'm not backing down, Alice. You're running out of time and money.
You're really pushing your luck now, Bob. Don't expect me to give in easily!
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or leave it.
